extDesc.message: Restyle the YouTube/Restream popout chat so you can overlay it for livestreams

default_chat_user.description: example message author when overlay starts

default_chat_msg.description: example message text when overlay starts

settings_lecture.message:
Customize the colors of the Live Chat Overlay. Enter the hex codes of the colors you'd like to use. Remember that full black #000 will be keyed out. You can delete a value to reset it to the default.

  • Black: #000
  • Dark Grey: #222
  • White: #fff
settings_lecture.description: instructions on how to setup extension

settings_words_desc.message: Enter a list of comma-separated words that will be highlighted in the chat

settings_advanced.message: Adjust these to make the comment text smaller or fit more lines of text. Sorry it's kind of hard to use.

settings_bottom_desc.message: (set negative to move lower when scaled down, e.g. -2vh)

settings_width_desc.message: (make text area wider when scaled down, e.g. 100)
